English name: NATIONAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) STRATEGY: KEY ACTION FOR PROMOTING THE INTEGRATION AND DEVELOPMENT OF AI IN CYPRUS
Original name(s): Εθνική Στρατηγική Τεχνητής Νοημοσύνης (ΤΝ): Δράσεις για την Αξιοποίηση και Ανάπτυξη της ΤΝ στην Κύπρο
Description: Current State: Public Consultation. The key actions for Promoting the Integration and Development of AI in Cyprus rest on 4 pillars.
Objective(s): To maximise investments through partnerships.To create national data space.To nurture talent, skills and life-long learning.To develop ethical and trustworthy AI.
Responsible organisation(s): Ministry of Transport, Communications and Works (MTCW;Υπουργείο Μεταφορών, Επικοινωνιών και Έργων)
Theme area(s): Emerging trends in STI policy|Human resources for research and innovation
Theme(s): Artificial intelligence (AI)|Digital skills for researchers|Ethics of emerging technologies
Target group type(s): Firms by size|Governmental entities|Intermediaries|Research and education organisations|Social groups especially emphasised
Target group(s): Civil society|Incubators, accelerators, science parks or technoparks|National government|Public research institutes|SMEs
Policy instrument type: Formal consultation of stakeholders or experts
Policy instrument mini-field(s): Method: Focus groups|Number of participants: More than 250|Stakeholders contribute to: Policy design

Description: The National Open Data Portal is an API interface that provides access to a large data repository of the public administration.
Target group type(s): Firms by age|Firms by size|Research and education organisations|Social groups especially emphasised
Target group(s): Civil society|Firms of any age|Firms of any size|Higher education institutes|Public research institutes
Policy instrument type: Information services and access to datasets
